text: tavada (madīnāvehi æti) kavurun (madīnāva tamangē) raṭa vaśayen- (makkāvehi siṭa pæmiṇi muhājirvarun vana) ovunṭa kaḷinma-gena, viśvāsaya tabā siṭiyōda ovunṭada, (ehi koṭasak æta). movun hijrat kara, taman veta pæmiṇena ayava ādarayen yutuva priya karana atara (tamanṭa nodī, hijrat karamin pæmiṇena) ovunṭa (pamaṇak) denu læbīma gænada, tama sit tuḷa aḍupāḍuvak vaśayen dakinnē næta. tavada tamanṭa diḷin̆dukama at vūvada, tamanṭa vaḍā ovunṭama (denu læbīma) tōrā ganu labannāha. mesē kavurun tanhāven tamanva ārakṣā kara gannōda, evænnanma jayagrahaṇaya at kara gat ayayi
